projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.about: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, sorted thought display by recency, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.about: A forcast projcet focused on Javascript, API interactions for fetching data. Shows 5 days weather, sunrise and sunset as well as current weather in Helsinki.

projects.name: Music Realeases
projects.about: A React app template to display albums. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. Components provided; focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: The Great Candy Conspiracy
projects.about: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Design is flexible but should prioritise accessibility.

projects.name: Chatbot built in Javascript
projects.about: A chatbot for pizza ordering. User can choose food by click on the buttons. This project focused on JavaScript and DOM.

projects.name: Reading Club
projects.about: A library type website made by Javascript. User can search books' information by different catagory, such as genre, publish time.
